${ModID}:Augment.NAME: Augment
${ModID}:Augment.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you have no empty Orb slots, 获得 1 Orb slot。
${ModID}:Augment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you have no empty Orb slots, 获得 1 Orb slot。

${ModID}:Allocate.NAME: Allocate
${ModID}:Allocate.DESCRIPTION: 获得 1 Orb slot for each enemy in combat。
${ModID}:Allocate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 1 Orb slot for each enemy in combat。

${ModID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${ModID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: 丢弃 一张牌。 NL If it was a Power card, Channel !M! Plasma. Otherwise, Channel !M! Lightning。

${ModID}:IcicleCrash.NAME: Icicle Crash
${ModID}:IcicleCrash.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Channel !M! Frost for each empty Orb slot。

${ModID}:Fear.NAME: Fear
${ModID}:Fear.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Channel !M! Dark。

${ModID}:Charge.NAME: Charge
${ModID}:Charge.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Trigger the passive abilities of your Channeled Orbs。

${ModID}:MaterialBoost.NAME: Material Boost
${ModID}:MaterialBoost.DESCRIPTION: 丢弃 any number of 张牌。 NL Evoke your next Orb once for each card 丢弃ed。
${ModID}:MaterialBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 丢弃 any number of 张牌。 NL Evoke your next Orb once for each card 丢弃ed。

${ModID}:Thunderstruck.NAME: Thunderstruck
${ModID}:Thunderstruck.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you play 一张牌 containing "Strike", Channel !M! Lightning。
